sql:
WITH game_mode_dates AS (
    SELECT 
        modename,
        CASE 
            WHEN submodename = '广域战场模式' THEN '20240723'
            WHEN modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%消灭战模式%' THEN '20230804'
            WHEN modename = '创意创作间' AND submodename = '幻想混战' THEN '20241115'
            WHEN modename = '休闲模式' AND submodename IN ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠') THEN '20240903'
            WHEN modename = '休闲模式' AND submodename LIKE '%策略载具%' THEN '20241010'
            WHEN modename = '创意创作间' AND submodename LIKE '%炎夏混战%' THEN '20240625'
            WHEN modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%单人装备%' THEN '20240517'
            WHEN modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%交叉堡垒%' THEN '20240412'
        END AS launch_date
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
    WHERE (
        (submodename = '广域战场模式') OR
        (modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%消灭战模式%') OR
        (modename = '创意创作间' AND submodename = '幻想混战') OR
        (modename = '休闲模式' AND submodename IN ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠')) OR
        (modename = '休闲模式' AND submodename LIKE '%策略载具%') OR
        (modename = '创意创作间' AND submodename LIKE '%炎夏混战%') OR
        (modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%单人装备%') OR
        (modename = '组队竞技' AND submodename LIKE '%交叉堡垒%')
    )
    GROUP BY modename, launch_date
),

first_players AS (
    SELECT 
        t.modename,
        t.vplayerid,
        MIN(t.firstroundtime) AS first_play_date
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di t
    JOIN game_mode_dates g ON t.modename = g.modename
    WHERE t.dtstatdate = g.launch_date
    GROUP BY t.modename, t.vplayerid
),

retention_data AS (
    SELECT 
        f.modename,
        f.first_play_date,
        p.dtstatdate,
        f.vplayerid,
        DATEDIFF(p.dtstatdate, f.first_play_date) AS retention_day
    FROM first_players f
    JOIN dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di p ON f.vplayerid = p.vplayerid AND f.modename = p.modename
    WHERE DATEDIFF(p.dtstatdate, f.first_play_date) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
)

SELECT 
    r.modename AS '玩法',
    r.first_play_date AS '上线首周首次玩的日期',
    r.retention_day AS '第几天留存',
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.vplayerid) AS '玩法留存用户数'
FROM retention_data r
GROUP BY r.modename, r.first_play_date, r.retention_day
ORDER BY r.modename, r.first_play_date, r.retention_day;

WITH monthly_playtime AS (
  -- Calculate total play time for each player in each mode per month
  SELECT 
    SUBSTRING(dtstatdate, 1, 6) AS month,
    vplayerid,
    CASE
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND mapname = '群屿' THEN '主题群屿'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '群屿' THEN '传统群屿'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '假日群岛' THEN '假日群岛'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '荣耀之城' THEN '荣耀之城'
      WHEN submodename = '广域战场模式' THEN '广域战场'
      WHEN submodename = '极能形态模式' THEN '极能形态'
      WHEN modename = '组队竞技' THEN '组竞'
      WHEN modename = '休闲模式' THEN '休闲'
      WHEN modename = '乐园' THEN '乐园'
      WHEN modename = '领地' THEN '领地'
      WHEN modename = '广阔天地' THEN '广阔天地'
      ELSE '其他模式'
    END AS play_mode,
    SUM(roundtime) AS total_playtime
  FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
  WHERE dtstatdate >= '20190508' AND dtstatdate <= '20250330'
  GROUP BY month, vplayerid, play_mode
),

player_main_mode AS (
  -- Determine the main play mode for each player (mode with max play time)
  SELECT 
    month,
    vplayerid,
    play_mode,
    total_playtime,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month, vplayerid ORDER BY total_playtime DESC) AS rn
  FROM monthly_playtime
),

monthly_stats AS (
  -- Count players by main play mode per month
  SELECT 
    month,
    play_mode AS main_play_mode,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS player_count
  FROM player_main_mode
  WHERE rn = 1
  GROUP BY month, play_mode
),

total_participants AS (
  -- Count total participants per month
  SELECT 
    month,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS total_players
  FROM player_main_mode
  GROUP BY month
)

-- Final result with all required metrics
SELECT 
  s.month,
  s.main_play_mode,
  s.player_count,
  t.total_players
FROM monthly_stats s
JOIN total_participants t ON s.month = t.month
ORDER BY s.month, s.player_count DESC;

WITH 
-- Players who participated in the target period (2024-12-14 to 2024-12-20)
current_players AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE imode = 1344338933661592832
    AND dtstatdate BETWEEN '2024-12-14' AND '2024-12-20'
),

-- Players who participated before the target period (on or before 2024-12-13)
old_players AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE imode = 1344338933661592832
    AND dtstatdate <= '2024-12-13'
)

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT cp.vplayerid) AS total_players,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN op.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN cp.vplayerid END) AS old_players,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN op.vplayerid IS NULL THEN cp.vplayerid END) AS new_players
FROM current_players cp
LEFT JOIN old_players op ON cp.vplayerid = op.vplayerid;

WITH date_ranges AS (
    SELECT '20240917' AS dt UNION ALL SELECT '20240918' UNION ALL SELECT '20240919' UNION ALL 
    SELECT '20240920' UNION ALL SELECT '20240921' UNION ALL SELECT '20240922' UNION ALL SELECT '20240923' UNION ALL
    SELECT '20241008' UNION ALL SELECT '20241009' UNION ALL SELECT '20241010' UNION ALL 
    SELECT '20241011' UNION ALL SELECT '20241012' UNION ALL SELECT '20241013' UNION ALL SELECT '20241014'
),
player_sequences AS (
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate,
        a.vplayerid
    FROM 
        dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di a
    JOIN 
        dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
        AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
        AND a.dteventtime < b.dteventtime
    JOIN 
        dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di c ON b.vplayerid = c.vplayerid 
        AND b.dtstatdate = c.dtstatdate
        AND b.dteventtime < c.dteventtime
    WHERE 
        a.dtstatdate IN (SELECT dt FROM date_ranges)
        AND a.buttontype = '411111'  -- 点击按钮
        AND b.buttontype = '411120'  -- 加入玩法
        AND c.buttontype = '411123'  -- 确认
),
join_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(*) AS join_times
    FROM 
        dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
    WHERE 
        dtstatdate IN (SELECT dt FROM date_ranges)
        AND buttontype = '411120'  -- 加入玩法
        AND vplayerid IN (SELECT vplayerid FROM player_sequences)
    GROUP BY 
        dtstatdate, vplayerid
)
SELECT 
    d.dt AS date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT j.vplayerid) AS player_count,
    SUM(j.join_times) AS join_count
FROM 
    date_ranges d
LEFT JOIN 
    join_counts j ON d.dt = j.dtstatdate
GROUP BY 
    d.dt
ORDER BY 
    d.dt;

WITH 
-- Define date ranges
date_ranges AS (
    SELECT '20240326' AS start_date, '20240403' AS end_date
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '20240528' AS start_date, '20240605' AS end_date
),

-- Generate all dates in the ranges
all_dates AS (
    SELECT dtstatdate
    FROM (
        SELECT date_add('2024-03-26', INTERVAL seq DAY) AS dt
        FROM (
            SELECT 0 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL 
            SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8
        ) t
        UNION ALL
        SELECT date_add('2024-05-28', INTERVAL seq DAY) AS dt
        FROM (
            SELECT 0 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL 
            SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8
        ) t
    ) t
    JOIN dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di ON dtstatdate = date_format(dt, '%Y%m%d')
    GROUP BY dtstatdate
),

-- Players by game mode type each day
mode_players AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN mode IN (401, 402, 403) THEN '第一人称'
            WHEN mode = 101 THEN '单排'
            WHEN mode = 102 THEN '双排'
            WHEN mode IN (103, 603) THEN '四排'
        END AS mode_type,
        SUM(roundcnt) AS roundcnt,
        SUM(roundtime) AS roundtime
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
    WHERE dtstatdate IN (SELECT dtstatdate FROM all_dates)
    AND (
        mode IN (401, 402, 403) OR -- 第一人称
        mode = 101 OR -- 单排
        mode = 102 OR -- 双排
        mode IN (103, 603) -- 四排
    )
    GROUP BY dtstatdate, vplayerid, 
        CASE 
            WHEN mode IN (401, 402, 403) THEN '第一人称'
            WHEN mode = 101 THEN '单排'
            WHEN mode = 102 THEN '双排'
            WHEN mode IN (103, 603) THEN '四排'
        END
),

-- Daily mode stats
daily_mode_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        mode_type,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS daily_players,
        SUM(roundcnt) AS daily_rounds,
        SUM(roundtime) AS daily_duration
    FROM mode_players
    GROUP BY dtstatdate, mode_type
),

-- Game retention (次日)
game_retention_1d AS (
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate AS original_date,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS game_retention_1d_count
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di a
    JOIN dws_jordass_login_di b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
        AND b.dtstatdate = date_format(date_add(str_to_date(a.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    WHERE a.dtstatdate IN (SELECT dtstatdate FROM all_dates)
    GROUP BY a.dtstatdate
),

-- Game retention (7日)
game_retention_7d AS (
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate AS original_date,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS game_retention_7d_count
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di a
    JOIN dws_jordass_login_di b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
        AND b.dtstatdate = date_format(date_add(str_to_date(a.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    WHERE a.dtstatdate IN (SELECT dtstatdate FROM all_dates)
    GROUP BY a.dtstatdate
),

-- Mode retention (次日)
mode_retention_1d AS (
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate AS original_date,
        a.mode_type,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS mode_retention_1d_count
    FROM mode_players a
    JOIN mode_players b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid AND a.mode_type = b.mode_type
        AND b.dtstatdate = date_format(date_add(str_to_date(a.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    WHERE a.dtstatdate IN (SELECT dtstatdate FROM all_dates)
    GROUP BY a.dtstatdate, a.mode_type
),

-- Mode retention (7日)
mode_retention_7d AS (
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate AS original_date,
        a.mode_type,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS mode_retention_7d_count
    FROM mode_players a
    JOIN mode_players b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid AND a.mode_type = b.mode_type
        AND b.dtstatdate = date_format(date_add(str_to_date(a.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    WHERE a.dtstatdate IN (SELECT dtstatdate FROM all_dates)
    GROUP BY a.dtstatdate, a.mode_type
)

-- Final result combining all metrics
SELECT 
    d.dtstatdate AS '统计日期',
    d.mode_type AS '对局类型',
    d.daily_players AS '每日对局人数',
    d.daily_rounds AS '每日对局次数',
    d.daily_duration AS '对局总时长(秒)',
    COALESCE(g1.game_retention_1d_count, 0) AS '游戏次留人数',
    COALESCE(g7.game_retention_7d_count, 0) AS '游戏7留人数',
    COALESCE(m1.mode_retention_1d_count, 0) AS '玩法次留人数',
    COALESCE(m7.mode_retention_7d_count, 0) AS '玩法7留人数'
FROM daily_mode_stats d
LEFT JOIN game_retention_1d g1 ON d.dtstatdate = g1.original_date
LEFT JOIN game_retention_7d g7 ON d.dtstatdate = g7.original_date
LEFT JOIN mode_retention_1d m1 ON d.dtstatdate = m1.original_date AND d.mode_type = m1.mode_type
LEFT JOIN mode_retention_7d m7 ON d.dtstatdate = m7.original_date AND d.mode_type = m7.mode_type
ORDER BY d.dtstatdate, d.mode_type;

WITH 
-- Get new emulator users registered between 2025-04-01 and 2025-05-30
new_emulator_users AS (
    SELECT 
        dregdate AS reg_date,
        vplayerid AS player_id
    FROM dws_jordass_emulator_df
    WHERE dregdate BETWEEN '20250401' AND '20250530'
),

-- Determine device types for these users
user_device_types AS (
    SELECT 
        neu.reg_date,
        neu.player_id,
        CASE 
            WHEN dld.device_type IN (1, 5) THEN '模拟器'
            WHEN dld.device_type = 0 THEN '手机端'
            ELSE '未知'
        END AS user_type
    FROM new_emulator_users neu
    LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_device_login_di dld
        ON neu.player_id = dld.vplayerid
        AND dld.dtstatdate = neu.reg_date
),

-- Calculate retention metrics
retention_metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        udt.reg_date,
        udt.user_type,
        udt.player_id,
        -- Check if user logged in 1 day after registration
        MAX(CASE WHEN dl.dtstatdate = DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS retained_1d,
        -- Check if user logged in 3 days after registration
        MAX(CASE WHEN dl.dtstatdate = DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS retained_3d,
        -- Check if user logged in 7 days after registration
        MAX(CASE WHEN dl.dtstatdate = DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS retained_7d,
        -- Check if user logged in 14 days after registration
        MAX(CASE WHEN dl.dtstatdate = DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 14) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS retained_14d,
        -- Check if user logged in 30 days after registration
        MAX(CASE WHEN dl.dtstatdate = DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 30) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS retained_30d
    FROM user_device_types udt
    LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di dl
        ON udt.player_id = dl.vplayerid
        AND dl.dtstatdate BETWEEN udt.reg_date AND DATE_ADD(udt.reg_date, 30)
    GROUP BY udt.reg_date, udt.user_type, udt.player_id
)

-- Final aggregation
SELECT 
    reg_date AS '日期',
    user_type AS '用户类型',
    COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS '人数',
    SUM(retained_1d) AS '次留人数',
    SUM(retained_3d) AS '三留人数',
    SUM(retained_7d) AS '七留人数',
    SUM(retained_14d) AS '14留人数',
    SUM(retained_30d) AS '30留人数'
FROM retention_metrics
GROUP BY reg_date, user_type
ORDER BY reg_date, user_type;

WITH 
-- Define mode launch dates
mode_launch_dates AS (
  SELECT '广域战场' AS modename, '20240723' AS launch_date UNION ALL
  SELECT '消灭战', '20230804' UNION ALL
  SELECT '幻想混战', '20241115' UNION ALL
  SELECT '荒野传说', '20240903' UNION ALL
  SELECT '策略载具', '20241010' UNION ALL
  SELECT '炎夏混战', '20240625' UNION ALL
  SELECT '单人装备', '20240517' UNION ALL
  SELECT '交叉堡垒', '20240412'
),

-- Get players who participated in each mode within 3 days of launch
participating_players AS (
  SELECT 
    m.modename,
    r.vplayerid,
    m.launch_date
  FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di r
  JOIN mode_launch_dates m ON 
    (r.modename = m.modename OR 
     (r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%消灭战模式%' AND m.modename = '消灭战') OR
     (r.modename = '创意创作间' AND r.submodename = '幻想混战' AND m.modename = '幻想混战') OR
     (r.modename = '休闲模式' AND r.submodename IN ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠') AND m.modename = '荒野传说') OR
     (r.modename = '休闲模式' AND r.submodename LIKE '%策略载具%' AND m.modename = '策略载具') OR
     (r.modename = '创意创作间' AND r.submodename LIKE '%炎夏混战%' AND m.modename = '炎夏混战') OR
     (r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%单人装备%' AND m.modename = '单人装备') OR
     (r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%交叉堡垒%' AND m.modename = '交叉堡垒'))
  WHERE r.dtstatdate BETWEEN m.launch_date AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(m.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
),

-- Get player registration dates
player_registrations AS (
  SELECT 
    vplayerid,
    dregdate
  FROM dws_jordass_login_df
  GROUP BY vplayerid, dregdate
),

-- Get player activity patterns for classification
player_activity AS (
  SELECT 
    p.modename,
    p.vplayerid,
    p.launch_date,
    MAX(CASE WHEN l.dtstatdate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') 
              AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
              AND SUBSTRING(l.cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_in_jordass_week_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN l.dtstatdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
              AND SUBSTRING(l.cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ever_active_in_jordass_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN l.dtstatdate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') 
              AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
              AND l.vgameappid IN ('wx', 'qq') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_in_platform_week_before,
    MIN(CASE WHEN l.dtstatdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(p.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
              AND SUBSTRING(l.cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' THEN l.dtstatdate ELSE NULL END) AS last_active_date_before_week
  FROM participating_players p
  LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_df l ON p.vplayerid = l.vplayerid
  GROUP BY p.modename, p.vplayerid, p.launch_date
),

-- Classify users into types
classified_users AS (
  SELECT 
    pa.modename,
    pa.vplayerid,
    pa.launch_date,
    CASE 
      -- 砺刃新增: registered within 3 days of launch and participated
      WHEN pr.dregdate BETWEEN pa.launch_date AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(pa.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%Y%m%d') 
      THEN '砺刃新增'
      
      -- 砺刃留存: active in jordass week before and participated
      WHEN pa.active_in_jordass_week_before = 1 THEN '砺刃留存'
      
      -- 砺刃回流: not active in jordass week before but was active before
      WHEN pa.active_in_jordass_week_before = 0 AND pa.ever_active_in_jordass_before = 1 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN DATEDIFF(
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), 
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.last_active_date_before_week, '%Y%m%d')
          ) BETWEEN 7 AND 13 THEN '砺刃回流（流失7-13天）'
          WHEN DATEDIFF(
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), 
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.last_active_date_before_week, '%Y%m%d')
          ) BETWEEN 14 AND 20 THEN '砺刃回流（流失14-20天）'
          WHEN DATEDIFF(
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), 
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.last_active_date_before_week, '%Y%m%d')
          ) BETWEEN 21 AND 59 THEN '砺刃回流（流失21-59天）'
          WHEN DATEDIFF(
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.launch_date, '%Y%m%d'), 
            STR_TO_DATE(pa.last_active_date_before_week, '%Y%m%d')
          ) >= 60 THEN '砺刃回流（流失60天以上）'
          ELSE '其他'
        END
      
      -- 平台盘内: active in platform week before but not in jordass
      WHEN pa.active_in_platform_week_before = 1 AND pa.active_in_jordass_week_before = 0 THEN '平台盘内'
      
      -- 平台盘外: not active in platform week before
      WHEN pa.active_in_platform_week_before = 0 THEN '平台盘外'
      
      ELSE '其他'
    END AS user_type
  FROM player_activity pa
  LEFT JOIN player_registrations pr ON pa.vplayerid = pr.vplayerid
),

-- Get total participants per mode
total_participants AS (
  SELECT 
    modename,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS total_users
  FROM participating_players
  GROUP BY modename
),

-- Get participants by type per mode
participants_by_type AS (
  SELECT 
    cu.modename,
    cu.user_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cu.vplayerid) AS participant_count,
    tp.total_users
  FROM classified_users cu
  JOIN total_participants tp ON cu.modename = tp.modename
  WHERE cu.user_type != '其他'
  GROUP BY cu.modename, cu.user_type, tp.total_users
)

-- Final result
SELECT 
  modename AS '玩法',
  user_type AS '用户类型',
  participant_count AS '上线后3天参与用户数',
  total_users AS '上线后3天总用户数'
FROM participants_by_type
ORDER BY 
  modename,
  CASE user_type
    WHEN '砺刃新增' THEN 1
    WHEN '砺刃回流（流失60天以上）' THEN 2
    WHEN '砺刃回流（流失21-59天）' THEN 3
    WHEN '砺刃回流（流失14-20天）' THEN 4
    WHEN '砺刃回流（流失7-13天）' THEN 5
    WHEN '砺刃留存' THEN 6
    WHEN '平台盘内' THEN 7
    WHEN '平台盘外' THEN 8
    ELSE 9
  END;

WITH inflow_modes AS (
    -- Define all inflow modes with their launch dates
    SELECT '广域战场模式' AS submodename, '2024-07-23' AS launch_date, '广域战场' AS modename UNION ALL
    SELECT '%消灭战模式%', '2023-08-04', '组队竞技' UNION ALL
    SELECT '幻想混战', '2024-11-15', '创意创作间' UNION ALL
    SELECT '荒野传说', '2024-09-03', '休闲模式' UNION ALL
    SELECT '荒野沙漠', '2024-09-03', '休闲模式' UNION ALL
    SELECT '%策略载具%', '2024-10-10', '休闲模式' UNION ALL
    SELECT '%炎夏混战%', '2024-06-25', '创意创作间' UNION ALL
    SELECT '%单人装备%', '2024-05-17', '组队竞技' UNION ALL
    SELECT '%交叉堡垒%', '2024-04-12', '组队竞技' UNION ALL
    SELECT '2611', '2024-04-26', '庆典混战' UNION ALL
    SELECT 'CG28-动物丛林', '2024-09-03', '传统模式' UNION ALL
    SELECT 'CG29-流浪地球', '2024-11-05', '传统模式'
),

outflow_modes AS (
    -- Define all outflow modes with their identification logic
    SELECT '主题群屿' AS outflow_name, 
           "modename='传统模式' and submodename like 'CG%' and mapname='群屿'" AS condition UNION ALL
    SELECT '传统群屿', "modename='传统模式' and mapname='群屿'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '假日群岛', "modename='传统模式' and mapname='假日群岛'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '山峦', "modename='传统模式' and mapname='山峦'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '极能形态模式', "submodename='极能形态模式'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '隧道', "modename='生存模式'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '广域战场', "submodename='广域战场模式'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '休闲模式', "modename='休闲模式'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '乐园', "modename='乐园'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '领地', "modename='领地'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '广阔天地', "modename='广阔天地'" UNION ALL
    SELECT '组队竞技', "modename='组队竞技'"
),

-- For each inflow mode, get users who played in first 3 days
inflow_participants AS (
    SELECT 
        i.submodename AS inflow_mode,
        i.modename AS inflow_modename,
        r.vplayerid,
        i.launch_date
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di r
    JOIN inflow_modes i ON 
        (i.submodename LIKE '% %' AND r.submodename = i.submodename) OR
        (i.submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND r.submodename = i.submodename) OR
        (i.submodename = '2611' AND r.submode = 2611) OR
        (i.submodename LIKE '%消灭战模式%' AND r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%消灭战模式%') OR
        (i.submodename LIKE '%策略载具%' AND r.modename = '休闲模式' AND r.submodename LIKE '%策略载具%') OR
        (i.submodename LIKE '%炎夏混战%' AND r.modename = '创意创作间' AND r.submodename LIKE '%炎夏混战%') OR
        (i.submodename LIKE '%单人装备%' AND r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%单人装备%') OR
        (i.submodename LIKE '%交叉堡垒%' AND r.modename = '组队竞技' AND r.submodename LIKE '%交叉堡垒%')
    WHERE r.dtstatdate BETWEEN i.launch_date AND DATE_ADD(i.launch_date, INTERVAL 3 DAY)
    GROUP BY i.submodename, i.modename, r.vplayerid, i.launch_date
),

-- For each inflow mode, get users who played outflow modes in week before launch
pre_launch_outflow_users AS (
    SELECT 
        i.submodename AS inflow_mode,
        i.modename AS inflow_modename,
        o.outflow_name AS outflow_mode,
        r.vplayerid,
        i.launch_date
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di r
    JOIN inflow_modes i ON 1=1
    JOIN outflow_modes o ON 1=1
    WHERE r.dtstatdate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(i.launch_date, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND DATE_SUB(i.launch_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
      AND (
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and submodename like 'CG%' and mapname='群屿'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND r.mapname = '群屿') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='群屿'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '群屿') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='假日群岛'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '假日群岛') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='山峦'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '山峦') OR
          (o.condition = "submodename='极能形态模式'" AND r.submodename = '极能形态模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='生存模式'" AND r.modename = '生存模式') OR
          (o.condition = "submodename='广域战场模式'" AND r.submodename = '广域战场模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='休闲模式'" AND r.modename = '休闲模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='乐园'" AND r.modename = '乐园') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='领地'" AND r.modename = '领地') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='广阔天地'" AND r.modename = '广阔天地') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='组队竞技'" AND r.modename = '组队竞技')
      )
    GROUP BY i.submodename, i.modename, o.outflow_name, r.vplayerid, i.launch_date
),

-- For each inflow mode, get users who played outflow modes in first 3 days after launch
post_launch_outflow_users AS (
    SELECT 
        i.submodename AS inflow_mode,
        i.modename AS inflow_modename,
        o.outflow_name AS outflow_mode,
        r.vplayerid,
        i.launch_date
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di r
    JOIN inflow_modes i ON 1=1
    JOIN outflow_modes o ON 1=1
    WHERE r.dtstatdate BETWEEN i.launch_date AND DATE_ADD(i.launch_date, INTERVAL 3 DAY)
      AND (
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and submodename like 'CG%' and mapname='群屿'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND r.mapname = '群屿') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='群屿'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '群屿') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='假日群岛'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '假日群岛') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='传统模式' and mapname='山峦'" AND r.modename = '传统模式' AND r.mapname = '山峦') OR
          (o.condition = "submodename='极能形态模式'" AND r.submodename = '极能形态模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='生存模式'" AND r.modename = '生存模式') OR
          (o.condition = "submodename='广域战场模式'" AND r.submodename = '广域战场模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='休闲模式'" AND r.modename = '休闲模式') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='乐园'" AND r.modename = '乐园') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='领地'" AND r.modename = '领地') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='广阔天地'" AND r.modename = '广阔天地') OR
          (o.condition = "modename='组队竞技'" AND r.modename = '组队竞技')
      )
    GROUP BY i.submodename, i.modename, o.outflow_name, r.vplayerid, i.launch_date
),

-- Calculate metrics for each inflow-outflow combination
metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        p.inflow_mode,
        p.inflow_modename,
        p.outflow_mode,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ip.vplayerid) AS inflow_participants_3day,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ip.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND pou.vplayerid IS NULL THEN p.vplayerid END) AS outflow_users_3day,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ip.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND pou.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN p.vplayerid END) AS dual_participation_users_3day,
        COUNT(DISTINCT p.vplayerid) AS pre_launch_outflow_participants,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pou.vplayerid) AS post_launch_outflow_participants
    FROM pre_launch_outflow_users p
    LEFT JOIN inflow_participants ip ON p.vplayerid = ip.vplayerid AND p.inflow_mode = ip.inflow_mode
    LEFT JOIN post_launch_outflow_users pou ON p.vplayerid = pou.vplayerid AND p.outflow_mode = pou.outflow_mode AND p.inflow_mode = pou.inflow_mode
    GROUP BY p.inflow_mode, p.inflow_modename, p.outflow_mode
)

-- Final result with all required metrics
SELECT 
    inflow_mode AS '流入玩法',
    inflow_modename AS '流入玩法名称',
    outflow_mode AS '流出玩法',
    inflow_participants_3day AS '上线后3天流入玩法参与用户数',
    outflow_users_3day AS '上线后3天流出用户数',
    dual_participation_users_3day AS '上线后3天双栖用户数',
    pre_launch_outflow_participants AS '上线前一周流出玩法总参与用户数',
    CASE WHEN pre_launch_outflow_participants > 0 
         THEN ROUND(outflow_users_3day * 100.0 / pre_launch_outflow_participants, 2) 
         ELSE 0 END AS '流出占比(%)',
    post_launch_outflow_participants AS '上线后3天流出玩法总参与用户数',
    CASE WHEN post_launch_outflow_participants > 0 
         THEN ROUND(dual_participation_users_3day * 100.0 / post_launch_outflow_participants, 2) 
         ELSE 0 END AS '双栖占比(%)'
FROM metrics
ORDER BY inflow_mode, outflow_mode;

WITH 
-- Players who played 拼图狂欢 between 2024.01.01-2024.01.07
players_week1 AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE imode = 1287652322611036928
    AND dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240107'
),

-- Players who played 拼图狂欢 between 2024.01.08-2024.01.14
players_week2 AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE imode = 1287652322611036928
    AND dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240108' AND '20240114'
),

-- Players who played 拼图狂欢 between 2024.01.15-2024.01.21
players_week3 AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE imode = 1287652322611036928
    AND dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240115' AND '20240121'
)

-- Final count of players who:
-- 1. Played in week1
-- 2. Didn't play in week2
-- 3. Played again in week3
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p1.vplayerid) AS player_count
FROM players_week1 p1
WHERE p1.vplayerid NOT IN (SELECT vplayerid FROM players_week2)
AND p1.vplayerid IN (SELECT vplayerid FROM players_week3);

WITH date_range AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        WEEK(STR_TO_DATE(dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d')) AS week_num,
        WEEK(STR_TO_DATE(dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d')) - WEEK(STR_TO_DATE('20240101', '%Y%m%d')) + 1 AS stat_week
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240202'
),

weekly_active_days AS (
    SELECT 
        stat_week,
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtstatdate) AS active_days
    FROM date_range
    GROUP BY stat_week, vplayerid
)

SELECT 
    stat_week AS '统计周',
    active_days AS '周活跃天数',
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS '玩家数'
FROM weekly_active_days
GROUP BY stat_week, active_days
ORDER BY stat_week, active_days;

WITH 
-- Users active on 2023.12.01
active_users AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        cbitmap
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dtstatdate = '20231201'
    AND SUBSTRING(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1'  -- Active on 2023.12.01
),

-- 7-day churn returners (inactive for 7 days then returned)
seven_day_returners AS (
    SELECT 
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS seven_day_return_count
    FROM active_users
    WHERE 
        -- No activity for next 6 days (positions 2-7)
        SUBSTRING(cbitmap, 2, 6) = '000000'
        -- But active on day 8 (position 8)
        AND SUBSTRING(cbitmap, 8, 1) = '1'
),

-- 30-day churn returners (inactive for 30 days then returned)
thirty_day_returners AS (
    SELECT 
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS thirty_day_return_count
    FROM active_users
    WHERE 
        -- No activity for next 29 days (positions 2-30)
        SUBSTRING(cbitmap, 2, 29) = '00000000000000000000000000000'
        -- But active on day 31 (position 31)
        AND SUBSTRING(cbitmap, 31, 1) = '1'
)

SELECT 
    seven_day_return_count AS "流失7天的回流用户数",
    thirty_day_return_count AS "流失30天的回流用户数"
FROM seven_day_returners, thirty_day_returners;

WITH eligible_modes AS (
    SELECT 
        matchsubmodegroup AS mode_id,
        matchsubmodegroupname AS mode_name
    FROM 
        dim_jordass_submodeonline_nf
    WHERE 
        DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE('20241001', '%Y%m%d'), STR_TO_DATE(onlinedate, '%Y%m%d')) >= 7
        AND DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE('20241007', '%Y%m%d'), STR_TO_DATE(onlinedate, '%Y%m%d')) <= 90
),

daily_players AS (
    SELECT 
        d.dtstatdate AS date,
        d.vplayerid AS player_id,
        d.imode AS mode_id
    FROM 
        dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di d
    JOIN 
        eligible_modes e ON d.imode = e.mode_id
    WHERE 
        d.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241007'
    GROUP BY 
        d.dtstatdate, d.vplayerid, d.imode
),

retention_data AS (
    SELECT 
        p1.date,
        p1.mode_id,
        COUNT(DISTINCT p1.player_id) AS participants,
        COUNT(DISTINCT p2.player_id) AS retained_players
    FROM 
        daily_players p1
    LEFT JOIN 
        daily_players p2 ON p1.player_id = p2.player_id 
        AND p1.mode_id = p2.mode_id
        AND p2.date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(p1.date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    GROUP BY 
        p1.date, p1.mode_id
)

SELECT 
    '20241001-20241007' AS period,
    r.date,
    SUM(r.participants) AS total_participants,
    SUM(r.retained_players) AS total_retained_players
FROM 
    retention_data r
GROUP BY 
    r.date
ORDER BY 
    r.date;

WITH 
-- Get all new users in the date range
new_users AS (
    SELECT 
        dregdate,
        vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dregdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240131'
),

-- Calculate daily new user counts
daily_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        dregdate,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS new_user_count
    FROM new_users
    GROUP BY dregdate
),

-- Calculate cumulative spending for each LTV period
ltv_data AS (
    SELECT 
        nu.dregdate,
        COUNT(DISTINCT nu.vplayerid) AS user_count,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 0 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv1,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 2 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv3,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 6 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv7,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 13 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv14,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 29 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv30,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 59 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv60,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 89 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv90,
        SUM(CASE WHEN CAST(w.dtstatdate AS DATE) - CAST(nu.dregdate AS DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 179 THEN w.imoney/100 ELSE 0 END) AS ltv180
    FROM new_users nu
    LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_water_di w ON nu.vplayerid = w.vplayerid
    WHERE w.dtstatdate >= nu.dregdate
    GROUP BY nu.dregdate
)

-- Final output with LTV calculations
SELECT 
    dc.dregdate AS 注册日期,
    dc.new_user_count AS 新进用户数,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv1, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV1,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv3, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV3,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv7, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV7,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv14, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV14,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv30, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV30,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv60, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV60,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv90, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV90,
    ROUND(COALESCE(ld.ltv180, 0) / dc.new_user_count, 2) AS LTV180
FROM daily_counts dc
LEFT JOIN ltv_data ld ON dc.dregdate = ld.dregdate
ORDER BY dc.dregdate;

WITH activity_data AS (
    SELECT 
        SUBSTRING(dteventtime, 1, 10) AS event_date,
        vplayerid
    FROM 
        dwd_jordass_activitypress_hi
    WHERE 
        ireason = 2411291018 
        AND buttontype = 10045 
        AND extarg1 IN (117, 115)
        AND dteventtime >= '2024-11-29' 
        AND dteventtime < '2024-12-20'
),

daily_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        REPLACE(SUBSTRING(event_date, 1, 10), '-', '') AS date_str,
        COUNT(*) AS pv,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS uv
    FROM 
        activity_data
    GROUP BY 
        REPLACE(SUBSTRING(event_date, 1, 10), '-', '')
),

total_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        '汇总' AS date_str,
        COUNT(*) AS pv,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS uv
    FROM 
        activity_data
)

SELECT * FROM daily_stats
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM total_stats
ORDER BY 
    CASE WHEN date_str = '汇总' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
    date_str;

WITH trigger_events AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        dteventtime,
        arg1,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vplayerid ORDER BY dteventtime) AS trigger_rank
    FROM 
        dwd_jordass_activityrecord_hi
    WHERE 
        actid = 2411070621 
        AND acttype = 10062
        AND StrArg1 <> '0'
        AND dteventtime >= '2025-01-11'
        AND dteventtime <= '2025-01-24'
),

user_total_draws AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        SUM(arg1) AS total_draws
    FROM 
        dwd_jordass_activityrecord_hi
    WHERE 
        actid = 2411070621 
        AND acttype = 10062
        AND dteventtime >= '2025-01-11'
        AND dteventtime <= '2025-01-24'
    GROUP BY 
        vplayerid
),

trigger_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        trigger_rank AS nth_trigger,
        COUNT(DISTINCT t.vplayerid) AS trigger_users,
        SUM(u.total_draws) AS total_draws
    FROM 
        trigger_events t
    JOIN 
        user_total_draws u ON t.vplayerid = u.vplayerid
    GROUP BY 
        trigger_rank
)

SELECT 
    nth_trigger AS '第X次触发',
    trigger_users AS '触发用户数',
    total_draws AS '用户总抽奖次数'
FROM 
    trigger_stats
ORDER BY 
    nth_trigger;
